gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]. Meteoblue indicates slightly lower temperatures (19.4°C) and possible rain, not stated by the baseline. Unfortunately, data from YR.no and Météo Belgique couldn't be extracted. Maybe carry a light jacket and umbrella, just in case - Brussels can be unpredictable like a monkey with a typewriter.
